channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Druid
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache Druid

item.title: CVE-2022-28889|2024-08-03T06:10:56.784Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20druid
item.description: In Apache Druid 0.22.1 and earlier, the server did not set appropriate headers to prevent clickjacking. Druid 0.23.0 and later prevent clickjacking using the Content-Security-Policy header.
